resources.string: To get help, hold down the button for 3 seconds. Then, select the type of help you need.
Enter your information to make it easier to locate or contact you in the event of an emergency

"Buoy was created as a way to respond to crises in a non-violent manner with a focus on conflict de-escalation and safety for all parties. In a world of discrimination and brutality, nobody should have to lose their life due to a 911 call. Buoy offers users a way to call for help quickly, quietly, and safely. Press and hold the Buoy button and then choose from the following types of help and a trained professional will respond to your crisis as soon as possible. "
"Select this if you are worried about the safety of yourself, others, or your community, to include: suspicious activity, being followed home, possible home intruders, sexual harassment, etc. "
"Select this if you are suffering from domestic violence or any problem involving family members, especially children. "
Select this is if you or someone else is experiencing suicidal thoughts, emotional turmoil, erratic behavior, drug abuse, self-harm, etc.
"Select this if you need to bounce an unruly customer, if you think a store has violated your rights, you encounter a fake id, you encounter counterfeit money, etc. "
Press & Hold for 10 seconds Once You Are Safe
Select this if an argument needs to be resolved, a fight needs to be broken up, a dispute needs to be settled, etc.
